title: Bug 116786: Library include should store relative path.
description: When a library is included in a report design, the BIRT designer should generate and save the relative path.
OB: The current behavior of the BIRT designer when including a library in a report design is unclear.
EB: The BIRT designer should automatically generate and save the relative path for the included library.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the BIRT designer.
2. Create a new report design or open an existing one.
3. Include a library by navigating to $project/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary.
4. Check if the relative path is correctly generated and saved.
